白飯.definition: plain cooked rice; rice with nothing to go with it

白饒.definition: to give sth extra free of charge; (coll.) in vain; to no avail

白首齊眉.definition: (of a couple) to grow old together in mutual respect (idiom)

白馬寺.definition: the Baima or White Horse Temple in Luoyang, one of the earliest Buddhist temples in China

白馬王子.definition: a Prince Charming; the man of one's dreams

白馬雞.definition: (bird species of China) white eared pheasant (Crossoptilon crossoptilon)

白馬雪山.definition: Baima Snow Mountains, up to 5430 m., in Dechen or Diqing Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

白駒過隙.definition: a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!

白骨精.definition: White Bone Spirit (in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]); (fig.) sly and cunning person

白鶴.definition: (bird species of China) Siberian crane (Leucogeranus leucogeranus)

白鶴拳.definition: Baihequan (Fujian White Crane) martial art form

白鶴梁.definition: White Crane Ridge at Fuling, Sichuan on the Changjiang River, that used to show above the water at dry periods, with famous carvings
